Title: Einhell 4259825 TC-ID1000 E Impact Drill 1010W 240V EINTCID1000E
Description:
The Einhell TC-ID 1000E Impact Drill is suitable for DIY enthusiasts to use around the home and garage. A switch lets you select between the drilling and impact drilling functions. The sturdy full metal key chuck assures a safe fixing of the tool bit. With the integrated electronic controls the speed can be pre-selected and precisely adjusted.

The sturdy, adjustable drilling depth stop is made of metal and enables exact, repeat drilling depths. The reversing facility means that screwdriving jobs can also be performed. For user-friendly and safe operation of the machine there is a large soft grip area and an additional handle with an anti-twist lock.

Chuck: 13mm.
Input Power: 1,010W.
No Load Speed: 0-3,000/min.
Impact Rate: 0-48,000/bpm.
Capacity: Concrete 16mm, Steel 13mm, Wood 32mm.
Weight: 2.12kg.
